name: Alot of Parking space
description:
The greatest parking lot manager sim the world has ever seen, probably. I supposed a few more features would be needed for that. But at least its playable, could be nice listening to the soundtrack and watching cars do their thing.

-Edit 19.3-

Reuploaded the build, fixed some things from the comments (appreciate it), attempted to fix some other issues, but it would probably be easier to remake it so instead I added a bomb which can destroy problematic cars/humans etc.
